channel.title: When did you started playing runescape?
channel.description: Just curious if their are any "old schoolers" left.. I started a few months it opened (2001) (my account is "pking" in RS), and signed up at the rscheatnet forums when they were new. When did you start playing? and when you started hanging out at cheating forums? - which forum?

item.title: When did you started playing runescape?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

October 2002, i play RuneScape for 10minutes at a time now, roughly once a month, any longer and i get so fucking bored.

Read full topic
item.source: When did you started playing runescape?

item.title: When did you started playing runescape?
item.dc:creator: @alexia alexia
item.description:
@alexia wrote:

I am not sure of the year, but I started 2 weeks after party hats were dropped. <_<

I played almost every day for about 3-4 years. Then, I took month long breaks and played for another 5 months at a time. Now, I haven’t really played in 4 months (partly because of my new job).

-Alexia

Read full topic
item.source: When did you started playing runescape?

item.title: When did you started playing runescape?
item.dc:creator: @Yoshi0308 Yoshi0308
item.description:
@Yoshi0308 wrote:

Started playing RS August of 2005. Started cheating on RS around March of 2007.

item.source: When did you started playing runescape?

item.title: When did you started playing runescape?
item.dc:creator: @gothic_queen casey.
item.description:
@gothic_queen wrote:

[quote=“MastrChief, post:16, topic:123921”]I started playing back in the RSC days. I played for about a week and lost the link, since t had been moved somewhere else on bonus.com. Then I started up again in (I think) early 2005 and mostly just played to talk to friends.

AT that time I played RSC, I was not well rounded with computers and the game itself amazed me because many people played together. I would just follow somebody around in this new online world and look at the detail of the game. It was nice back then…[/quote]
I still remember classic, I though 50 woodcuting was like, wow.
I really aren’t good in it, I’m an elite 3, there aren’t many lvl 3’s left.
I made h0110w back then, as well as a old main of mine.

Read full topic
item.source: When did you started playing runescape?

item.title: When did you started playing runescape?
item.dc:creator: @MastrChief MastrChief
item.description:
@MastrChief wrote:

I started playing back in the RSC days. I played for about a week and lost the link, since t had been moved somewhere else on bonus.com. Then I started up again in (I think) early 2005 and mostly just played to talk to friends.

AT that time I played RSC, I was not well rounded with computers and the game itself amazed me because many people played together. I would just follow somebody around in this new online world and look at the detail of the game. It was nice back then…

Read full topic
item.source: When did you started playing runescape?

item.title: When did you started playing runescape?
item.dc:creator: @Gotta_Catch_Them_All Gotta Catch Them All
item.description:
@Gotta_Catch_Them_All wrote:

billygotshot:

i miss the day of the 200k santas -.- my friend ended up buying one for 50k then selling it for 200k thinking it would never go up in price i guess he was wrong

I bought a blue mask 200k when I used to play on my old account. Then lost it, and didn’t care at all. I had like 600k in the bank thinking I was rich. I wish I had that halloween mask back.

Read full topic
